IntroductionÂ¶

Xcelerate is a training app that where users can interact with personalized, dynamically-generated training plans that focus towards an upcoming race, such as a marathon or a 10k. The goals of this app are two-fold: the interface and scheduled training will provide a key source of motivation, while the flexible training plans will update as users meet, don’t meet, or exceed their suggested training.
